data.text:
@Generali11 Indeed. 

Your point is ? Are you suggesting vaccinations solved polio & measles ? So that's the logic for mass vax for Covid ? 

Few actually had polio vaccines btw

63 but not that age is relevant to the debate.

@Generali11 That's the theory but end result could be very different. 

Human immune system for healthy is c. 99% efficient whilst the vax is in 80% region.

Odds for unhealthy people are much lower. Death counts & numbers are currently unreliable. 

Scientists have hung everyone out to dry

@Generali11 But not as effective as the immune system itself.

Understood ?
